1.4.name: wordpress/wpsc-dta-export
1.4.description:
Export orders from the WP e-Commerce Plugin as DTA File. This fileformat is used in Germany to exchange information about money transactions with banks or online banking programs. It uses the DTA class written by Hermann Stainer. It automatically remembers the last exported order to avoid double payments. Tested with wp-e-commerce Version 3.7.4.

The plugin needs PHP 5+.

Translations

  • German
